mapper.select: select c.code as collectorCode,c.name as collectorName, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 1 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as power, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 2 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as lighting, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 3 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as airConditioner, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 4 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as airPressure, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 5 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as elevator, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 6 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as live, (select sum(statistik) from signal_hour sh inner join switch s on sh.switchID = s.code inner join collector c on s.collectorID = c.code where (sh.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl' or sh.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl') and sh.time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.switchType = 7 and c.code = #{collectorID}) as special from collector c where c.code = #{collectorID}
